topics.body: Although clearlu meant to be an apology and defense of his actions in many levels more rhan an impartial desceiption of the costumes of his time Fray Servandos "Memories" are quite the informative read about mostky political, religious and social life in the early XIX century Spain, France and Italy, joining his own experiences to historical data and little pearls of wisdom and info regarding all kinds of things. A very nice read although it can get tremendoysly heavy considering the extense descrptions of legal processes and religious protocol.

Fallout 4 was announced and I wasnt given any nótice, preposterous! 
well, you can find Paul Reveres house, Old South church where Sam Adams sent the crowd to the Boston tea revolt and Faneuil Hall and the old Courthouse in front of which the Boston massacre took place. But in general I agree with you, its a pretty meh city.

¿Y tú que tienes contra fray Servando? ¿No te gustaba su horrendo gorrito? ¿O que a pesar de que era noble y doctor se seguía haciendo llamar fray?
Pues como dje, puede llegar a ser bastante pesado pero en general se pone bueno en como sus aventuras llegaron a ser y e como se queja tan amargamente de las viciaitudes de la época. Aprendí que desde el xix hay posers.
